search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for EasyBroker (easybroker-archive.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for EasyBroker is: [https://www.easybroker.com/precios](https://www.easybroker.com/precios)【3:2†source】.

Plans & Pricing | EasyBroker
===============

[![Image 1: EasyBroker logo](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/product/minimal/logo-95ed60bf87896a9529f0da5c665f088990968b38e1688cbba1cd44fde3748eb0.svg)](https://www.easybroker.com/en-mx)

[![Image 2: EasyBroker logo](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/product/minimal/logo-95ed60bf87896a9529f0da5c665f088990968b38e1688cbba1cd44fde3748eb0.svg)](https://www.easybroker.com/en-mx)

![Image 3: EasyBroker logo](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/product/minimal/logo-95ed60bf87896a9529f0da5c665f088990968b38e1688cbba1cd44fde3748eb0.svg)

[* Home](https://www.easybroker.com/en-mx)[* Agent Websites](https://www.easybroker.com/en-mx/real-estate-website)[* Prices](https://www.easybroker.com/en-mx/plans)

[* Find houses and apartments](https://www.easyaviso.com/en-mx)[* Help and Support](https://ayuda.easybroker.com/)

[Enter](https://www.easybroker.com/en-mx/account/authentication/new)

©2025 EasyBroker, LLC. All rights reserved.

Plans that adapt to your business
=================================

Monthly Payment

Annual Payment 20% Off

#### PlanFree

**$0** MXN/month

Empower your team with CRM access for up to 20 users.

[Get started](https://www.easybroker.com/signup)

**$0** MXN/month

Empower your team with CRM access for up to 20 users.

[Get started](https://www.easybroker.com/signup)

###### Features:

*   Personalize MLS listings
*   Easily manage your contacts and leads with a sales pipeline
*   Earn commissions collaborating with other agents
*   Send personalized listings via WhatsApp or email
*   Create search alerts and receive emails with new options for your clients

#### PlanAgent

**$490** MXN/month

Publish and share your own listings for **$490** per user.

[Get started](https://www.easybroker.com/signup)

**$392** MXN/month

Publish and share your own listings. Each additional user costs **$392**.

[Get started](https://www.easybroker.com/signup)

###### Everything in the Free Plan and:

*   Find the property you need in the MLS with advanced filters.
*   Add unlimited listings and manage your inventory online
*   Publish your listings on the MLS and other real estate websites (some sites may charge additional fees)
*   Automatically track listing leads in your Inbox
*   Download personalized listings in PDF
*   Create comparative market reports

#### PlanAgent + Website

**$990** MXN/month

Includes one user and a [website](https://www.easybroker.com/mx/real-estate-website). Each additional user costs **$490**.

[Get started](https://www.easybroker.com/signup)

**$792** MXN/month

Includes one user and a [website](https://www.easybroker.com/mx/real-estate-website) and each additional user costs **$392** paid annually.

[Get started](https://www.easybroker.com/signup)

###### Everything in the Agent Plan and:

*   Use your own domain
*   Secure your site with an SSL certificate at no extra cost
*   Automatically publish your listings and listings from the agents you collaborate with on your website
*   Personlize the design and content without a web designer

Connections with real estate websites and other apps
----------------------------------------------------

Publish your properties on popular real estate listing websites and connect your account to other apps.

##### Free portals

*   ![Image 4](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/clasificados-contacto-93ad4c515d0ff379653978e30d90f06a9cabde3ebdc61d4480688d0096cc01f3.svg)Clasificados Contacto
*   ![Image 5](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/easyaviso-5ff7c190016885fc4ea2a68a672eb8f9164781590993e6347d938cb1795afc66.svg)EasyAviso
*   ![Image 6](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/propiedades-dot-com-90436be84185f13dc8b0f668514121de3d818981b4719f9f8495ec31089045da.svg)Propiedades.com

##### Portals with additional fees

*   ![Image 9](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/casas-y-terrenos-40f970e9d5467369785825b1b8c6d5905fcb631c1d54ddaca680c830597de9a2.svg)Casas y Terrenos

*   ![Image 11](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/inmuebles24-2e5794207dde382d863555a9872dbbffdf74c8c14249ae858a3d5d6b6c6d8810.svg)
    
    Inmuebles24
*   ![Image 12](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/mercado-libre-b40a4b197960ffe0f47ef36700e9ad557e1837221cf0a42fb9437efd29e9835f.svg)Mercado Libre
*   ![Image 13](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/portal-terreno-b41fab38c93dfcfea3935ad4ca136c27dc801110d4c26230227e9f9deb7fd9cc.svg)Portal Terreno
*   ![Image 14](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/proppit-8e6bdfb80ccabfb23692bdba2dc56f66dec54d4214076011013abeef8ba5568f.svg)Proppit

##### Other apps

*   ![Image 15](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/omni-mls-54551f7d226bb0ac4dff7134dd22ba8dfe1f3a253d791f1f4ae19753d1b75509.svg)Omni MLS
*   ![Image 16](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/valoresampi-38e96d91cd97826869c1c6ae625d3b6dd89ed1d51342c67e05aec7f6e9d4db15.svg)ValoresAMPI
*   ![Image 17](https://cdn.easybroker.com/assets/agent/partners/icon/zapier-7ac53afb84a50409ffc72fe1f964a9a15ec706a33a5b322b9db7160cc97714aa.svg)Zapier

Frequently Asked Questions
==========================

[How can I pay for my plan?](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#how-can-i-pay-for-my-plan)

Just create your account and then go to the _Payments and Billing_ page where you can choose the number of users, payment frequency and your preferred payment method and then you can start uploading and publish your properties immediately.

[Do you offer bulk discounts when purchasing many users?](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#do-you-offer-bulk-discounts-when-purchasing-many-users)

Yes, there are discounts when purchasing more than 20, 40, or 80 users that are automatically applied to your bill.

[Do I have to upload my properties one by one?](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#do-i-have-to-upload-my-properties-one-by-one)

You can import properties from a spreadsheet and in some cases we can help you move your properties and images from an existing website.

[Do you have interest-free fixed monthly payments?](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#do-you-have-interest-free-fixed-monthly-payments)

We have no interest-free fixed rates. We will always charge the total amount to be paid, however you can pay monthly, semi-annually or annually and choose between the different payment methods available.

[How do I get my invoice?](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#how-do-i-get-my-invoice)

EasyBroker cannot issue invoices but it can issue tax receipts. Why? We are a company with a tax address abroad, so we issue purchase receipts that have tax validity. We comply with the requirements that are asked of companies residing abroad. The published prices already include VAT. [Here's how you can use the receipts](https://ayuda.easybroker.com/article/116-como-puedo-obtener-una-factura)

[Can I cancel at any time?](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#can-i-cancel-at-any-time)

Yes. As the account owner, you can cancel it whenever you want. Just keep in mind that payments are made at the beginning of the contracted period, so we recommend waiting until the end of that period to do so.

[If I have further questions, with whom can I solve them?](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#if-i-have-further-questions-with-whom-can-i-solve-them)

You can contact our support team through chat or by email at [hola@easybroker.com](mailto:hola@easybroker.com)

##### Language and region

Language

[English](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Español](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Português](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#)

Which region do you want to search in?

[Argentina](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Chile](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Costa Rica](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Dominican Republic](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [El Salvador](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Guatemala](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Honduras](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Mexico](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Panama](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#) [Peru](https://www.easybroker.com/plans?lang=en#)

Simple straight-forward affordable no-obligation plans for your real estate agency.
